page.title: 13Shopping Area
page.content: The main A260 road from Folkestone to Canterbury runs through the village.On this road are the major village facilities,the pub,the village hall, the school,the church,the shops and the garages. The shops consist of a general stores,butchers,bakers,a sweet shop & newsagents,a chemist,a DIY shop and a hair salon.There is also a Doctor's Surgery. These estalishments are grouped together on the side of the road.Further down the road is an antique shop.On a side road there is a sub-post office and a small super- market.There is also a bank. There are 5 garages on the main road.However only one sells petrol,two are concerned mainly with selling cars,one with selling caravans and one with car repairs.
